trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de acionamento deixa um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma ação de StopStoryboard com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>interativamente parar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: StopStoryboard afeta apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>quando este está ativo (depois do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>inicia).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Parar um acionadores de guião gráfico principal da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>eventos, mas não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>tem de referenciar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>que controla <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter um exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Colocar em pausa, retomar, parar, caso contrário, o controlo um guião gráfico principal interativamente para conseguir fazer pausa, retomar ou caso contrário, controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou StopStoryboard) para controlar a consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não foi especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: utilizar os accionadores de eventos para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"> </xref> classe.
